snippet: A California judge issued a blistering decision against a law that gives tenure to teachers, regardless of how well they do the job.
abstract: Editorial welcomes ruling by California Judge Rolf M Treu that state laws governing hiring and firing of teachers are unconstitutional and result in minority children being disproportionately saddled with incompetent teachers; says ruling opens new chapter in equal education battle; holds teachers' unions must work to change outdated policies, or they will have change thrust upon them.
lead_paragraph: A California judge issued a blistering decision against a law that gives tenure to teachers, regardless of how well they do the job.

headline.seo: In California, a Judge Takes On Teacher Tenure
headline.main: A New Battle for Equal Education
headline.print_headline: A New Battle for Equal Education
